mapper.select: SELECT AVG(daily_cnt) FROM ( SELECT SUBSTRING(create_date, 1, 6) AS day, COUNT(*) AS daily_cnt FROM statistic.request_info ri WHERE request_code = 'L' GROUP BY SUBSTRING(create_date, 1, 6) ) t
SELECT COUNT(*) AS totCnt FROM statistic.request_info ri LEFT JOIN statistic.holiday h ON LEFT(ri.create_date, 8) = h.holiday_date WHERE ri.request_code = 'L' AND h.holiday_date IS NULL

SELECT u.hr_organ AS department, COUNT(DISTINCT u.user_id) AS connectedUserCount FROM statistic.request_info ri JOIN statistic.user u ON ri.user_id = u.user_id WHERE ri.request_code = 'L' AND u.hr_organ = #{department} GROUP BY u.hr_organ

SELECT u.hr_organ AS department, concat('20', #{yearMonth}) as yearMonth, COUNT(DISTINCT u.user_id) AS connectedUserCount FROM statistic.request_info ri JOIN statistic.user u ON ri.user_id = u.user_id WHERE ri.request_code = 'L' AND u.hr_organ = #{department} AND left(ri.create_date, 4) = #{yearMonth} GROUP BY u.hr_organ, yearMonth

SELECT SUBSTRING(create_date, 1, 6) AS yearMonthDay, COUNT(*) AS totCnt FROM statistic.request_info WHERE request_code = 'LR' AND SUBSTRING(create_date, 1, 6) = #{yearMonthDay} GROUP BY SUBSTRING(create_date, 1, 6)
SELECT b.board_id AS id, b.title FROM statistic.board b WHERE b.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY b.board_id DESC
